<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2895</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Human rights and Children rights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliche Rechte und Kindrechte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droits de l'homme et droits d'enfants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas humanas e direitas das crianças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diritti dell'uomo e diritti dei bambini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα και δικαιώματα παιδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Derechos humanos y las derechas de los niños</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit about Human right and responsibilites, and Children's rights and responsibilities..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Human rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">children's rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">responsibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über 
menschliches Recht und responsibilites und Rechte und 
Verantwortlichkeiten der Kinder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive au sujet de droit
de l'homme et responsibilites, et les droits et les responsabilités 
des enfants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa sobre a direita 
humana e os responsibilites, e direitas e responsabilidades das 
crianças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva circa il diritto 
dell'uomo e responsibilites e diritti e responsabilità dei bambini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα για το 
ανθρώπινο δικαίωμα και responsibilites, και δικαιώματα και 
ευθύνες των παιδιών ..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva sobre derecho 
humano y responsibilites, y las derechas y responsabilidades de los 
niños.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliche Rechte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechte der Kinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verantwortlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droits de l'homme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les droits des enfants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">responsabilité</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas humanas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">responsabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diritti dell'uomo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diritti dei bambini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">responsabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
